full_description:
SJCAM SJ4000 Air Full Hd Wi-Fi Waterproof Sports Action Camera

The SJCAM SJ4000 Air has full HD resolution recording at 1920x1080. Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) allows you to Capture warm and vivid Picturesque scenes with the SJ4000. It detects motion to make your movie clips sharp and exciting. The SJ4000 Air focuses on image quality and affordability. Although not waterproof out of the box, it comes with a 98' waterproof housing, which is also used to attach the camera to one of the several mounts included, such as the helmet mount. One of the recording resolutions is 720p at up to a high frame rate of 120 fps for achieving professional-like slow motion in editing. It features a built-in mic and speaker, a microSD card slot for recording, and built-in Wi-Fi for connecting to the companion iOS/Android SJCAM app. The mobile app allows you to control select functions of the camera remotely as well as set up time-lapse sessions and use other creative tools. This action camera has a removable battery that runs approximately 70 minutes when recording Full HD 1080p video. The battery is rechargeable by connecting the camera to a USB power source using an included cable. The USB port is also used for offloading your photos and videos to your computer for storage, editing, and sharing. The SJCAM SJ4000 Air has no warranty.

full_description:
SJCAM SJ4000 Dual Screen Full HD WiFi Waterproof Sports Action Camera

The SJCAM SJ4000 Dual Screen Full HD WiFi Waterproof Sports Action Camera is a versatile and durable camera designed for adventure enthusiasts. With its 170° ultra-wide angle lens and 16MP camera, it allows you to capture stunning photos and videos in Full HD quality. Whether you're hiking, biking, surfing, or engaging in any other thrilling activity, this action camera is built to accompany you every step of the way. The SJCAM SJ4000 is a dual-screen design. It features a 2.0" high-definition main screen on the back and a 1.3" front screen, enabling you to easily frame your shots and preview your footage while you're on the move. This dual-screen setup is particularly beneficial for capturing self-portraits or group shots, as it allows you to see exactly what's being captured in real-time. Thanks to its WiFi compatibility, you can connect the camera to your smartphone or tablet and remotely control it from a distance of up to 10 meters. This feature comes in handy when you want to position the camera in hard-to-reach places or capture shots from unique angles. You can also conveniently transfer your photos and videos wirelessly to your mobile device for instant sharing with friends and family. The SJCAM SJ4000 is built to withstand the elements. It comes with durable waterproof housing that enables you to take the camera underwater to depths of up to 30 meters. Whether you're snorkeling, diving, or simply enjoying a day at the beach, this camera allows you to capture the mesmerizing underwater world with ease. The SJCAM SJ4000 Dual Screen Full HD WiFi Waterproof Sports Action Camera is a reliable and feature-packed device for capturing your adventures. With its dual screens, wide-angle lens, WiFi connectivity, and waterproof housing, it empowers you to unleash your creativity and document your thrilling experiences in stunning detail.

SJCAM SJ6 Legend 16MP 4K Wi-Fi Waterproof Touch Screen Sports Action Camera

The SJCAM SJ6 Legend features a waterproof case, gyro stabilization, and 4K resolution to capture sharp, high-quality footage no matter what the scene. It can record MOV/MP4 H.264 video at a maximum resolution of 2880 x 2160p at 24 fps and takes 16MP JPEG photos at a maximum resolution of 4608 x 3456. It has a 166Â° wide-angle lens that facilitates quick focus and captures a large field of view. It features a Panasonic MN34120PA CMOS sensor with a Novatek 96660 chipset. It comes with a 2" LCD rear touchscreen that provides access to settings such as distortion correction, metering, 180Â° rotation, exposure time, adjustable FOV, loop recording, double file, raw photos, GYRO, EV, color, and white balance, each allowing you to fine-tune your shots. It also has a front LCD with basic information like timecode, resolution, battery level, and record mode. The SJ6 comes with multiple mounting options, bases, and plates for optimal placement flexibility, as well as a waterproof back housing door and a touchscreen door for non-waterproof access during your shoot. The SJCAM SJ6 Legend comes with no warranty.

full_description:
SJCAM SJ6 Pro 24MP 4K Wi-Fi Dual Screen Waterproof Sports Action Camera

The SJCAM SJ6 Pro 4K Action Camera can record sharp, high-quality video in any environment thanks to its 98' waterproof shell, 6-axis gyro stabilization, and up to 4K60 resolution. The speaker and microphone are built into the thin plastic body, which barely weighs a few ounces. Additionally, it is capable of recording slow-motion video at up to 1080p120 resolution. The SJ6 Pro captures 24MP JPEG images and MOV/MP4 H.264 video at a maximum quality of 4K60. Its 165 degree wide-angle lens allows for quick focusing and captures a big field of view. In addition to having settings for timer, car, continuous shooting, and interval modes, the camera also has settings for loop recording, time-lapse, vertical screen, video+photo, and fast motion. To set up and operate the camera, it has a 2" back touchscreen and a 1.3" front LCD screen. With a full charge, the mini-USB-chargeable 1000mAh battery operates for around two hours. Due to its detachability, you can buy a replacement to use for longer shoots and charge with a different battery charger that is sold separately. The device features Wi-Fi, and an extra wireless remote control that can be purchased separately can be used to start and pause videos, take multiple photos in succession, turn on and off Wi-Fi, and turn on and off the camera. Additionally, the free SJCAM Zone software lets you edit and share your images and videos while operating the camera from your iOS or Android smartphone.

SJCAM A20 Wearable Multipurpose Portable Body Camera

The SJCAM A20 Portable Body Camera shoots 2880p video at 24 fps with a broad 166° field of view. Additionally, the machine can capture still photographs at resolutions of up to 16MP. This Wi-Fi body camera has a 2.33" LCD touchscreen, two built-in microphones, a built-in speaker, and a 2650mAh lithium battery. full_description:
SJCAM SJ8 Pro 12MP 4K Wi-Fi Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera

The SJCAM SJ8 Pro Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera has a waterproof shell, a touchscreen, and gyro stabilization to capture precise, high-quality film no matter what the situation is, whether you're running, bicycling, flying, driving, or boating. The SONY IMX377 CMOS sensor and Ambarella H22 S85 chipset are housed in a lightweight plastic housing that weighs only a few ounces. The SJ8 Pro shoots 12MP JPEG/raw photographs with a maximum resolution of 4000 x 3000 at 60 frames per second and records MP4 H.264/H.265 video at a maximum quality of 3840 x 2160p at 60 frames per second. It boasts an 8x digital zoom and a 170Â° wide-angle lens that allows for rapid focus and captures a huge field of view. Time-lapse, picture burst, slow motion, video+photo, and TV modes are among the camera's many features, as are settings for automobile (syncs to the motor with optional connection) and FPV (first-person view) modes. Its 2.33" IPS retina LED back touchscreen gives you access to brightness, color temperature, external mic, frequency, and Wi-Fi options, all of which let you fine-tune your setup. A front OLED LCDs basic information such as timecode, resolution, battery level, and recording mode. On a full charge, the SJCAM SJ8 Pro Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera has a 1200mAh battery that lasts about 90 minutes and can be charged via a USB Type-C connection. Because it's detachable, you can buy a spare to use for longer shoots and charge it with a separate battery charger. The SJCAM SJ8 Pro Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera records to a microSD card with a maximum capacity of 128GB, and video and photographs may be exported via the USB-C connector. There's a speaker on top and two noise-canceling mics built into the front and sides of the housing, plus you can buy an external mic that plugs into the USB-C port separately. Video start/stop, picture burst, Wi-Fi on/off, photo shutter, and camera on/off may all be controlled using an optional wireless remote, which can be purchased separately. With the free SJCAM Zone app, you can manage the camera's operations, edit and share your photographs and movies from your iOS or Android smartphone. For maximum positioning freedom, the SJ8 comes with several mounting options, bases, and plates, as well as a watertight enclosure for underwater images. A USB Type-C connector, lens cover, and cleaning cloth are all included in the camera box. The SJCAM SJ8 Pro Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera has no warranty.

full_description:
SJCAM SJ10X 12MP 4K Wi-Fi Waterproof Action Camera

The SJCAM SJ10X is one of the best sports cameras of the moment. Take it with you when you practice your favorite activities or put it on your cat's back. Shoot 4K videos and relive your adventures over and over again, stay with us to find out all its features. SJCAM SJ10X 4K has been designed for you to enjoy and relive your favorite moments and adventures. Get the best images in a wide range of situations and environments thanks to its powerful OmniVision sensor. Add to this a high-performance processor, the Novatek 96883, which will allow you to record videos in 4K quality, as well as take fabulous 12MP photos. This new SJCAM SJ10X model features a 2.33" IPS panel with UHD resolution, allowing you to watch all of your photographs and movies in stunning detail. The touch-sensitive screen on your new SJCAM makes it even easier to use, allowing you to set up your camera fast and intuitively. With the 3-axis GYRO stabilizer on the SJCAM SJ10X 4K, you can get even more steady pictures. It removes abrupt transitions and visuals that are softened as a result of movement. While kayaking, riding, or skating, record yourself. The videos will always be of great quality, no matter what you do. There is a complete connection. Because it has WiFi connectivity, the SJCAM SJ10X was designed to be used conveniently with your smartphone. So you can view what you're recording in real-time and even upload photographs and videos to your phone. SJCAM understands that you want to take your SJ10X sports camcorder with you on all of your athletic adventures. That's why it has a waterproof body that can withstand water up to 10 meters deep without the use of a protective cover, allowing you to use it even in wet settings. In addition, the SJCAM SJ10X 4K comes with a 1300 mAh rechargeable battery that can record for up to 140 minutes, which is enough for a full day of shooting. The SJCAM SJ10X Action Camera has no warranty.
